templates.description: A workaround notice to batch library bill notices (e.g. aged to lost / lost item fee assessed). Unfortunately cannot put the amount due in the notice so it will have to be generic.

en.header: Action required: Return lost item(s) that have been billed
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These overdue item(s) are considered lost, and your account has been billed for them. Unpaid bills may suspend your borrowing privileges.

Please return these items as soon as you can. When checked in, the lost item fee(s) will be removed from your account.

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}
Return due date was: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

{{/loans}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items and to see and pay library bills. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Library Bill Notice - Batch

templates.description: Course Reserve check out receipt

en.header: Library course reserve checkout confirmation
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}, 

Course Reserves -- Check due date/time carefully.

You have checked out these course reserve item(s) from the library indicated below.

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Location: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}
Checked out on: {{loan.initialBorrowDateTime}}
Return by: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

{{/loans}}

NOTE! Course reserve items must be returned to the library from which they were borrowed.

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Course Reserves Checkout Receipt

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Short Term - Checkout Receipt

templates.description: Sent automatically when a due date is manually edited in FOLIO, for short-term loans (includes due date TIME).

en.header: New due date for a library item
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This item has a new due date:

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return by: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Short Term - New Due Date

templates.description: include due date TIME and is always sent individually

en.header: Library item is due soon
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This item is due soon. Please return it before {{loan.dueDateTime}}.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return by: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
You can renew this item: {{loan.numberOfRenewalsRemaining}} more time(s).

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Short Term - Courtesy Due Date Reminder

templates.description: Notice sent 2 days after due date

en.header: Action required: Return overdue library items
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These item(s) are now overdue and may be accruing fines. Please return them as soon as possible.

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return due date was: {{loan.dueDate}}

{{/loans}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus. 

If you already returned these item(s), please ignore this email.

templates.name: Overdue  notice

templates.description: Overdue fines for returned materials, equipment

en.header: Library fines on returned materials
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This item was returned late and accrued the following fines. You may pay this fine in My Account.

Outstanding fines may result in suspended borrowing privileges. We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Date due: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
Date checked in: {{loan.checkedInDateTime}}

Fine charge date: {{feeCharge.chargeDate}}
Fine category: {{feeCharge.type}}
Total fine: {{feeCharge.amount}}
Payment status: {{feeCharge.paymentStatus}}

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Short Term - overdue fines on returned materials

Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This item has been renewed:

Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

You can renew this item: {{loan.numberOfRenewalsRemaining}} more time(s)

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library. 

﻿You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Short Term - Renewal Receipt

templates.description: Notice sent after staff manually waive/forgive a fee/fine.

en.header: Library bill has been waived or paid
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

The following fee/fine has been waived or paid.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}
Charged on: {{feeCharge.chargeDateTime}}
Amount owed: {{feeCharge.amount}}
Fee type: {{feeCharge.type}}
Payment status: {{feeCharge.paymentStatus}}
Remaining amount owed: {{feeCharge.remainingAmount}}
Additional info: {{feeCharge.additionalInfo}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: TEST - Automatic fee waived manually notice

en.header: Library items due soon
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These item(s) are due soon. Please return or renew them before their "return by" date.

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return by: {{loan.dueDate}}
You can renew this item: {{loan.numberOfRenewalsRemaining}} more time(s).

{{/loans}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus. 

Thank you for your prompt response.

templates.description: Notice to recall items, due date shortened to 7 days from date item is recalled.

en.header: Action required: Return recalled item
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This library item is needed by another user and needs to be returned by {{loan.dueDate}}. We were unable to get an alternative copy from our partner libraries, which is why you need to return this copy now. Recalled items not returned on time may be charged overdue fines.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
The item now needs to be returned by: {{loan.dueDate}}

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Recall notice

templates.description: Recall overdue fines for returned materials

en.header: Library fines on returned materials
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This recalled item was returned late and accrued the following recall fines. You may pay this fine in My Account.

Outstanding fines may result in suspended borrowing privileges. We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Date due: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
Date checked in: {{loan.checkedInDate}}

Fine charge date: {{feeCharge.chargeDate}}
Fine category: {{feeCharge.type}}
Total fine: {{feeCharge.amount}}
Payment status: {{feeCharge.paymentStatus}}

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Short Term - Recalled overdue fines on returned materials

templates.description: Short term loan specific: a reminder library bill notice

en.header: Reminder: Return lost item(s) that have been billed
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These overdue item(s) are considered lost, and your account has been billed for them. Unpaid bills may suspend your borrowing privileges.

Please return these items as soon as you can. When checked in, the lost item fee(s) will be removed from your account.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return due date was: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items and to see and pay library bills. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library. Note: If you have filed a Claims Return with the owning library, please ignore this message. We are still looking for them and will update you soon.

You can return item(s) to any Stanford library or a library book drop on campus.

templates.name: Short Term - Library Bill Notice

en.header: A library item is ready for pickup
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

An item you requested is ready for pickup at the {{request.servicePointPickup}}. Please pick it up by {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}; otherwise it will be returned.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Pickup at: {{request.servicePointPickup}}
Pickup by: {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

Log in to MyAccount to modify your requests and check their status. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.description: Overdue fines for returned materials

Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

These overdue item(s) are considered lost, and your account has been billed for them. Unpaid bills may suspend your borrowing privileges.

Please return these items as soon as you can. When checked in, the lost item fee(s) will be removed from your account.

{{#loans}}

{{/loans}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items and to see and pay library bills. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library. Note: If you have filed a Claims Return with the owning library, please ignore this message. We are still looking for them and will update you soon.

templates.name: Library Bill Notice - Batch Reminder

templates.description: Notice sent to borrower after library items are checked in at a library.

en.header: Library return confirmation
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Thank you for returning these item(s):

{{#loans}}
Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Return by: {{loan.dueDate}}
Checked in: {{loan.checkedInDateTime}}

{{/loans}}
Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Check-in Receipt

en.header: Action required: Fees assessed for overdue course reserve items
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Your course reserve item is overdue. Please return it as soon as possible.

A lost item replacement fee has been assessed for this item.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Location: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}

Checked out on: {{feeCharge.chargeDateTime}}
Return due date was: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
Fee type: {{feeCharge.type}}
Amount owed: {{feeCharge.amount}}

NOTE! Course reserve items must be returned to the library they were borrowed from.

You can pay these fines in MyAccount. If you need assistance, please contact the {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}.
Outstanding fees may result in suspended borrowing privileges.

Visit our website for more information regarding fines and fees.

templates.description: Overdue fines for returned Course Reserves materials

en.header: Action required: Overdue fines for course reserves
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Your course reserve item was returned late and accrued the following fines:

Title: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Location: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}

Return due date was: {{loan.dueDateTime}}
Date checked in: {{loan.checkedInDateTime}}

Fee Type: {{feeCharge.type}}
Charged on: {{feeCharge.chargeDateTime}}
Amount Owed: {{feeCharge.amount}}

You can pay these fines through MyAccount. Outstanding fines may result in suspended borrowing privileges.

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

﻿Thank you for your prompt response.

templates.name: Course Reserves Overdue fines on returned materials

templates.description: Explanation for canceled request

en.header: Library request canceled
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Your request for this item has been canceled.

Cancellation Reason: {{request.reasonForCancellation}}
{{request.additionalInfo}}

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Request Cancellation

templates.description: Overdue notice for course reserves only

en.header: Action required: A Course Reserve item is overdue – please return
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

This course reserve item is overdue and may be accruing fines. Please return it as soon as possible to {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}
Location: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}
Return due date was: {{loan.dueDateTime}}

Course reserve materials must be returned to the library they were borrowed from. 

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library. 

Thank you for your prompt response. If you already returned the item(s), thank you, and please disregard this notice.

templates.name: Checkout Receipt

templates.description: Notice sent after a manual fee charge has been added to a user's account.

en.header: Notice of library fee
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

You have been charged a fee for the item below.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationSpecific}}

Fee type: {{feeCharge.type}}
Additional Info: {{feeCharge.additionalInfo}}
Charged on: {{feeCharge.chargeDateTime}}
Amount owed: {{feeCharge.amount}}

Log in to MyAccount to manage your items. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Manual fee billed notice

en.header: Action required: Pick up your library item before it is returned
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}},

Come pick up the item you requested by {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}; otherwise it will be returned.

Title/Author: {{item.title}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Pickup at: {{request.servicePointPickup}}
Pickup by: {{request.holdShelfExpirationDate}}
Owning library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

Log in to MyAccount to modify your requests and check their status. If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.description: This notice is sent to the patron after a fee is paid, waived, refunded, transfered or canceled.

en.header: Confirmation Library Fee/Fine is Paid or Waived
en.body:
Hello {{user.firstName}}{{user.lastName}},

We have either received your payment for the following fee, or it has been forgiven.

Type of Fee: {{feeCharge.type}}
Additional Info: {{feeCharge.additionalInfo}}
Total Fee: {{feeCharge.amount}}
Barcode: {{item.barcode}}
Title: {{item.title}}
Library: {{item.effectiveLocationLibrary}}

Paid On: {{feeAction.actionDateTime}}
Payment Category: {{feeAction.type}}
Additional Info: {{feeAction.additionalInfo}}
Amount Paid: {{feeAction.amount}}
Remaining Amount: {{feeAction.remainingAmount}}
Payment Status: {{feeCharge.paymentStatus}}

If you need assistance, please contact the owning library.

templates.name: Manual fee payment, waive, refund, transfer or cancel
